heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers near and north of Route 2, becoming likely and spreading south to around Route 4 late, with a slight chance farther south. Highs in the low to mid 50s in the south, and mid 40s to around 50 north, with some lower 40s far north. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph late from the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley into the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain showers, mixing with or changing to snow north, with 1 to 3 inches in the hills, and a dusting possible at lower elevations outside the broad northern valleys. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s. West to northwest winds gusting to 45 mph near and north of Route 4, and to 55 mph south of Route 4.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny in southern valleys. Mostly to partly cloudy north, and in the southern mountains, with morning snow or rain showers tapering off. Highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s north, and mid to upper 40s in the south. Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 40 mph in the morning.
